fullShareClassName.title: Full Share Class Name
fullShareClassName.description: Complete fund name including Umbrella and share class specifications

iSIN.title: ISIN
iSIN.description: International Securities Identification Number of the share class

cUSIP.title: CUSIP
cUSIP.description: 9-character alphanumeric code identifying North American financial securities

shareClassCurrency.title: Share Class Currency
shareClassCurrency.description: Reference currency of the share class (ISO 4217)

shareClassLifecycle.title: Share Class Lifecycle
shareClassLifecycle.description: Current stage of the share class lifecycle

investmentStatus.title: Investment Status
investmentStatus.description: Status of share class for new or existing investors

shareClassDistributionPolicy.title: Share Class Distribution Policy
shareClassDistributionPolicy.description: Indicates if the share class is distributing or accumulating dividends

shareClassLaunchDate.title: Share Class Launch Date
shareClassLaunchDate.description: Date when the share class was launched and first NAV calculated

minimalInitialSubscriptionCategory.title: Minimal Initial Subscription Category
minimalInitialSubscriptionCategory.description: Type of minimum requirement for initial investments (shares, amount, or both)

minimalInitialSubscriptionInShares.title: Minimal Initial Subscription In Shares
minimalInitialSubscriptionInShares.description: Minimum number of shares required for new investments

minimalInitialSubscriptionInAmount.title: Minimal Initial Subscription In Amount
minimalInitialSubscriptionInAmount.description: Minimum amount required for an initial investment

currencyOfMinimalSubscription.title: Currency of Minimal Subscription
currencyOfMinimalSubscription.description: Currency used for minimal subscription amounts

minimalRedemptionCategory.title: Minimal Redemption Category
minimalRedemptionCategory.description: Indicates if redemptions can be made in monetary amounts

minimalInitialRedemptionInShares.title: Minimal Initial Redemption In Shares
minimalInitialRedemptionInShares.description: Minimum number of shares for redemption

maximumInitialRedemptionInShares.title: Maximum Initial Redemption in Shares
maximumInitialRedemptionInShares.description: Maximum number of shares allowed for initial redemption

maximumInitialRedemptionInAmount.title: Maximum Initial Redemption in Amount
maximumInitialRedemptionInAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for initial redemptions

currencyOfMinimalOrMaximumRedemption.title: Currency of Minimal or Maximum Redemption

shareClassDividendType.title: Share Class Dividend Type
shareClassDividendType.description: Method of income distribution for distributing share classes

sRRI.title: SRRI
sRRI.description: Latest Synthetic Risk and Reward Indicator of the share class

hasLockUpForRedemption.title: Has Lock-up For Redemption
hasLockUpForRedemption.description: Indicates presence of a lock-up period for early redemption

lockUpComment.title: Lock-up Comment
lockUpComment.description: Details about the lock-up period and conditions

lockUpPeriodInDays.title: Lock-up Period in Days
lockUpPeriodInDays.description: Duration of the lock-up period in days

launchPrice.title: Launch Price
launchPrice.description: Initial purchase price for fund units during the subscription period
